sn36.6:4.1: “Assutavā, bhikkhave, puthujjano sukhampi vedanaṃ vedayati, dukkhampi vedanaṃ vedayati, adukkhamasukhampi vedanaṃ vedayati.
sn36.6:4.2: Sutavā, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako sukhampi vedanaṃ vedayati, dukkhampi vedanaṃ vedayati, adukkhamasukhampi vedanaṃ vedayati.
sn36.6:4.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, ko viseso ko adhippayāso kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanenā”ti?
sn36.6:4.5: assutavā, bhikkhave, puthujjano dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṃ kandati sammohaṃ āpajjati.
sn36.6:4.8: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, purisaṃ sallena vijjheyya.
sn36.6:4.9: Tamenaṃ dutiyena sallena anuvedhaṃ vijjheyya.
sn36.6:4.10: Evañhi so, bhikkhave, puriso dvisallena vedanaṃ vedayati.
sn36.6:4.11: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutavā puthujjano dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṃ kandati sammohaṃ āpajjati.
sn36.6:4.14: Tassāyeva kho pana dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno paṭighavā hoti.
sn36.6:4.15: Tamenaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighavantaṃ, yo dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo, so anuseti.
sn36.6:4.16: So dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno kāmasukhaṃ abhinandati.
sn36.6:4.18: Na hi so, bhikkhave, pajānāti assutavā puthujjano aññatra kāmasukhā dukkhāya vedanāya nissaraṇaṃ, tassa kāmasukhañca abhinandato, yo sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo, so anuseti.
sn36.6:4.19: So tāsaṃ vedanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
sn36.6:4.20: Tassa tāsaṃ vedanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ appajānato, yo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya avijjānusayo, so anuseti.
sn36.6:4.21: So sukhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, saññutto naṃ vedayati.
sn36.6:4.22: Dukkhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, saññutto naṃ vedayati.
sn36.6:4.23: Adukkhamasukhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, saññutto naṃ vedayati.
sn36.6:4.24: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘assutavā puthujjano saññutto jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, saññutto dukkhasmā’ti vadāmi.
sn36.6:5.1: Sutavā ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno na socati, na kilamati, na paridevati, na urattāḷiṃ kandati, na sammohaṃ āpajjati.
sn36.6:6.2: Tamenaṃ dutiyena sallena anuvedhaṃ na vijjheyya.
sn36.6:6.3: Evañhi so, bhikkhave, puriso ekasallena vedanaṃ vedayati.
sn36.6:6.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno na socati, na kilamati, na paridevati, na urattāḷiṃ kandati, na sammohaṃ āpajjati.
sn36.6:6.7: Tassāyeva kho pana dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno paṭighavā na hoti.
sn36.6:6.8: Tamenaṃ dukkhāya vedanāya appaṭighavantaṃ, yo dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo, so nānuseti.
sn36.6:6.9: So dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno kāmasukhaṃ nābhinandati.
sn36.6:6.11: Pajānāti hi so, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako aññatra kāmasukhā dukkhāya vedanāya nissaraṇaṃ.
sn36.6:6.12: Tassa kāmasukhaṃ nābhinandato yo sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo, so nānuseti.
sn36.6:6.13: So tāsaṃ vedanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavaṃ ca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
sn36.6:6.14: Tassa tāsaṃ vedanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ pajānato, yo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya avijjānusayo, so nānuseti.
sn36.6:6.15: So sukhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, visaññutto naṃ vedayati.
sn36.6:6.16: Dukkhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, visaññutto naṃ vedayati.
sn36.6:6.17: Adukkhamasukhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, visaññutto naṃ vedayati.
sn36.6:6.18: Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘sutavā ariyasāvako visaññutto jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi, visaññutto dukkhasmā’ti vadāmi.
sn36.6:6.19: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhave, viseso, ayaṃ adhippayāso, idaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanenāti.
sn36.6:7.4: Mahā viseso kusalassa hoti.
sn36.6:8.2: Vipassato lokamimaṃ parañca;
